title: Our Menu
description: Indulge in culinary delights at Othello Restaurant in Grimsby. Explore our tantalizing menu, crafted with passion and featuring exquisite flavors that will leave you wanting more.

Buttons.title: Lunch
Buttons.description: Explore our Greek-inspired lunch menu, brimming with authentic dishes crafted from the finest Mediterranean ingredients. Click now to savor the taste of Greece

Buttons.title: Dinner
Buttons.description: Embark on a captivating Mediterranean dinner experience. Immerse yourself in the vibrant flavors of Greece, with fresh, authentic ingredients and delectable creations.

Buttons.title: Desserts
Buttons.description: Explore our irresistible dessert menu and indulge in heavenly baklava, creamy baileys mouse, and more.

Buttons.title: Wine
Buttons.description: Raise a glass to Greek traditions. Explore our wine menu and experience the rich flavors that complement our authentic Greek cuisine
